intro: Campylocentrum benelliae, commonly known as the Benellia starfish, is a species of flowering plant native to South Africa. It is a member of the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its distinctive star-shaped flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun conditions. It features small, lance-shaped leaves and produces vibrant purple or pink blossoms. Due to its unique appearance and limited distribution, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
